subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Warriors, now 29-2, lost on Wednesday for the second time this season, but even the 72-10 Chicago Bulls of 1995-96 had a groaner: a 32-point loss to the Knicks.
snippet: The Warriors, now 29-2, lost on Wednesday for the second time this season, but even the 72-10 Chicago Bulls of 1995-96 had a groaner: a 32-point loss to the Knicks.
